description:
Lieven Gryp from Prodata Mobilty will be our first guest speaker. Lieven will come and talk to us about their zabbix environment. How they use zabbix to monitor hardware, software and the business process of the automatic ticketing system. Prodata Mobility is running zabbix on all kinds of different architectures even in house developed hardware.
Don't miss our first zabbix talk and sign up !


- PC architecture vs ARM based embedded systemen
- desktop PC's, Intel based servers vs in-house developed systems 
- Windows vs Linux
- online vs offline devices
- systeem software (standard ICT) vs business application monitoring
name: 1st Zabbix Belgium meetup

description:
Ok majority has decided that our next meetup will next thursday 18:00h 

For those who had to miss the Zabbix Conference .... You will have the time to ask me and Tom all your questions. 

We will talk about Zabbix 2.4 that was released just before the conference and the upcomming Zabbix release.

And we will announce our 3rd Meetup that we are planning :)

Hope to see you all on thursday !
name: 2nd Zabbix Meetup

description:
Mattias Geniar  is managing its Zabbix monitoring setup with puppet at Nucleus, and is willing to show us the how's and why's. Also some demos are included.

This meetup is organized together with the Belgian Puppet User Group.

Beside Zabbix related information, I'm sure we will have a great opportunity to get introduced to Puppet.

See you there.

Thanks Mattias for organizing this meetup.
name: How to work with Zabbix API en Configuration Mgmt
